      • close

        public static void close(Closeable closeable,
         boolean suppressError)
                  throws IOException
        Closes the given closeable.
        Parameters:
        closeable - If null, does nothing.
        suppressError - If true, logs the error instead of throwing it.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • closeQuietly

        public static void closeQuietly(Closeable closeable)
        Closes the given closeable, logging any errors that occur instead of throwing them.
        Parameters:
        closeable - If null, does nothing.

        destination - Can't be null.

      • toString

        public static String toString(URL url)
                       throws IOException
        Reads all bytes from the given url and converts them into a string using the response content encoding. If that encoding isn't a valid Java charset, uses StringUtils.UTF_8 instead.
        Parameters:
        url - Can't be null.
        Returns:
        Never null.
        Throws:
        IOException
